Banner.Description: I have 1.5 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, NodeJS and ExpressJS and sometimes in c# applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1.5 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with ExpressJS, NestJs, MongoDB and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: MEAN Stack developer
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using Node.js and Express.

Developed a real-time e-commerce website using Node.js, integrating Twilio for customer communication and Razorpay for secure payment processing, enhancing customer engagement and transaction efficiency.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Developed multiple projects using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, delivering robust and scalable web applications.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: AuthGuardian
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: AuthGuardian is a next-generation authentication app built from scratch using Angular and NgRx. The platform features a robust auth module with JWT token support, state management, secure user management, and a configurable permissions system for enhanced security and user experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tirex
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Tirex is a next-generation e-commerce website built from scratch, designed for purchasing premium bicycles. The platform features an auth module, configurable product display options, advanced user management, and a feedback system for personalized shopping experiences.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: EasyPassportal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: EasyPassPortal is a passport management system with a robust admin panel that facilitates police verification and live tracking of applications. It simplifies the management of passport processes, providing real-time monitoring and efficient handling of verification tasks.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Netflix Clone
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: NetflixClone is an Angular-based web app that mimics Netflix. Using third-party APIs, it displays a range of movies and TV shows, including ratings, descriptions, and media content. Users can browse and search through a vast library, offering a Netflix-like streaming experience.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: APIBuilder: ASP.NET Web API Practice
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: APIBuilder: A side project for creating and managing APIs using ASP.NET Web API and Swagger UI.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: 3DAnimator: Interactive 3D Animation with JavaScript
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created a 3D animated application using JavaScript, featuring a minimalist design and interactive animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JWT Integration
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: JWT AUTHENTICATION IN NODE JS WITH POSTGREESQL DB

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
